text:
Здравейте,

От ОЗБОР ни уведомяват, че по приложената фактура сме извършили частично плащане от 2 555,86 евро и питат кога ще извършим плащане до пълната сума

 

From: Yulia Maslova <ym@ozbor.cy> 
Sent: Friday, August 25, 2023 10:26 AM
To: Yulia Goncharenko <yg@ozbor.cy>; Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com>
Cc: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com>; Office <office@tibiel.com>; Trade <Trade@tibiel.com>; ozbor operations <operations@ozbor.cy>
Subject: Re: Sale on BGH for Gas Day 01.08.2023_OZBOR ENTERPRISES LIMITED

 

 

Dear All, good morning!

 

We received only 2’555.86 EUR as per the attached invoice

 

Please advise about the remaining amount

 

Thank you!

 

Kind regards,

Yulia Maslova

__________________________________

OZBOR ENTERPRISES LIMITED

E-mail: ym@ozbor.cy <mailto:ym@ozbor.cy>  
Tel: +41 79 826 34 54 <tel:+41%2079%20826%2034%2054>  

 



     Anthoupoleos, 28, Lakatamia,

     Nicosia, 2301, Cyprus

 

From: Yulia Goncharenko <yg@ozbor.cy <mailto:yg@ozbor.cy> >
Date: Tuesday, 1 August 2023 at 12:47 PM
To: Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com <mailto:a.ivanova@tibiel.com> >
Cc: "Backoffice@tibiel.com <mailto:Backoffice@tibiel.com> " <Backoffice@tibiel.com <mailto:Backoffice@tibiel.com> >, "office@tibiel.com <mailto:office@tibiel.com> " <office@tibiel.com <mailto:office@tibiel.com> >, "Trade@tibiel.com <mailto:Trade@tibiel.com> " <Trade@tibiel.com <mailto:Trade@tibiel.com> >, ozbor operations <operations@ozbor.cy <mailto:operations@ozbor.cy> >
Subject: Sale on BGH for Gas Day 01.08.2023_OZBOR ENTERPRISES LIMITED

 

Dear Aneta,

Please find attached our next invoice. 

 

 

Kind regards,

Yulia Goncharenko

__________________________________

OZBOR ENTERPRISES LIMITED

E-mail: yg@ozbor.cy <mailto:yg@ozbor.cy>  
Tel: +41 78 928 36 36

 



     Anthoupoleos, 28, Lakatamia,

     Nicosia, 2301, Cyprus
